title: Manos Hadjidakis - Free Diving OST + Honeymoon OST (1995)@flac
description:
The score for two films by Yorgos Panousopoulos.
HONEYMOON (Op. 36, 1978), which the composer regarded as â€œperhaps the most important and most perfect music I have written for the cinema,â€ was orchestrated and conducted by him.
Hadjidakis had also promised Yorgos Panousopoulos to write the score for his film FREE DIVING (1995), but death prevailed.
In pursuit, Nikos Kypourgos (composer and student of Hadjidakis) undertook to transcribe two themes from RHYTHMOLOGY (Op. 28, for piano, 1969-71) and adapt them to the filmâ€™s needs. For this work, he was awarded the State Music Prize for the Cinema.

In HONEYMOON, the listener can discern the extraordinary blending of wind instruments with the sensitive musicalness that the composer was so skilful in extracting from his musicians; whilst in FREE DIVING, Kypourgos focuses his attention mainly on the stringed instruments of the splendid Patras Soloists. (sirius.gr)
